Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
the meaning of this word is uncertain and even its etymology cannot be easily established
= action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
= action by which humans who find themselves in difficult circumstances put their trust in someone else, ► in order to find protection or safety

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

Node.gloss: to take refuge|to find refuge|to find shelter
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals who find themselves in difficult circumstances go to a certain location, ► in order to find protection or safety
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= process by which events take place that cause damage, distress, hurt, and/or loss of life
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= an epithet for the God of Israel ◄ as the one who not only lives in the highest heavens but is also worthy of the highest honor
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to bring to end successfully|to fulfill (one's) purpose
Node.definition: = causative action by which a deity brings an event related to someone else to a succesful end
= causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

Node.gloss: to reproach|to taunt|to insult|to defy|to blaspheme
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans make an effort to arouse an emotion of shame in (other) humans or deities; ◄ by their words or actions
= pattern of actions by which humans subject individuals or entire communities to cruelty and/or injustice

Node.gloss: to send|to cause to happen|to stir up
Node.definition: literally: to send; hence: = causative action by which deities cause an event to happen
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

Node.gloss: to lie > to be (in a location, without defense)
Node.definition: literally: to lie in a certain place; hence: = state in which humans are located in a certain place, with the connotation of being in a vulnerable position
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= pertaining to having a thin cutting edge; ► in order to make it useful and effective as a tool; ≈ often associated with aggression and danger

literally: to be, become high; hence: = processs by which humans or deities acquire an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= net of unknown size and shape; ► used for hunting birds and other animals, and also for fishing; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an object to be firmly located in a certain place

literally: footstep, used exclusively in a figurative way to denote part of one's journey through life; hence: = something that is being done and, when God is the agent, something that other people ought to do as well; at the same time one can easily slip and fall, which is a metaphor for failure

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which humans break up and move earth or stone, usually with a tool, and with the purpose of creating a hole
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control
literally: (one's) heart is established
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: (one's) heart is established
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
literally: glory; hence: = the inner person of a human being ◄ as the glory and pride of that individual
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a soundbox made of wood with strings of animal intestines stretched over the top, parallel to the soundbox

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing
= causative action by which someone wakes up someone else from his sleep
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
read בַּל־אֻמִּים as בַּלאֻמִּים among the nations
= a large body of people united by common descent
= state in which an event has a high intensity
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

literally: to be, become high; hence: = processs by which humans or deities acquire an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
